step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Ensure you feel a gentle resistance to help with lymph flow.
You're doing well opening your palm and fingers wide. Keep this movement consistent.
Excellent! Making a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles is key. Remember to visualize the fluid moving.
Great work opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. This completes the pumping action.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm overhead, open your hand wide, and then make a fist while breathing in. As you exhale, open your hand again to help move fluid.
